Clip.Title: THE BIG BLUE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Watch as cameras capture what happens when the Blue Whale, the planet's largest living creature, has a feeding frenzy off the coast of southern Australia.

Clip.Title: TAIJI AND BROOME: WEATHERING THE WHALING CONTROVERSY
Clip.Episode: Taiji and Broome: Weathering the Whaling Controversy
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Taiji, a town in Japan, and Broome, a town in Australia, were sister city for over 30 years. However, after Taiji became the focus of protests by anti-whaling groups worldwide, Broome was hit with severe criticism as well. The conflicting emotions and anguish felt by the people of Taiji and Broome are revealed here.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: No time to rest as The Bionic Vet puts all of his surgical and engineering skills into an operation for puppy Jolly, while battling exhaustion.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Australia is famously known as "The Great South Land". And it's indeed her southern seas which most define her. The south coast encompasses 5 States and stretches thousands of miles.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Watch as cameras capture what happens when the Blue Whale, the planet's largest living creature, has a feeding frenzy off the coast of southern Australia.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Even in the farthest Northern realms of Norway, Global Warming is taking hold. Here, the Reindeer Herders struggle to adapt as the temperature in the region gradually rises.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: High above the Gulf of St. Lawrence, one of the East Coast's hidden wonders lies below - the Magdalene Islands - offering some of the region's top beaches, grassy hillsides and spectacular cliff faces.

However, after Taiji became the focus of protests by anti-whaling groups worldwide, Broome was hit with severe criticism as well. Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: SHUTTLE DISCOVERY'S LAST MISSION
Clip.EpisodeSummary: With more than 27 years of service, the space shuttle Discovery has clocked more time in space than any other shuttle. She has flown more than 148 million miles, and has become one of the most storied spacecraft in American history. Join us as we celebrate her remarkable past and follow her final flight: to the Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum. It's an emotionally charged mission full of logistical challenges. Discovery is a robust, but very fragile aircraft, and getting her to D.C. in one piece will require some innovative engineering.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the waters of Juan de Fuca Strait to Gulf Islands National Park Reserve, Vancouver Island's Southern Coastline is a rich palette of incredible sea life and natural beauty.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Vancouver Island's Eastern Coastline is a rich mix of coastal towns, islands, inland mountains and seascapes - from Nanaimo to Campbell River and beyond.

Clip.Title: WOMEN AMONG WOLVES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This is a story of one woman's passion for wolves. Gudrun Pflueger is an ex world champion cross country skier and long distance runner who is on the search for the coast wolves of British Columbia.

Clip.Title: VENOM ISLANDS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: On a string of Southern Indonesian islands, poisonous predators lurk, each with its own toxic cocktail suited to its hunting style. Some bite. Some sting. Some strike quickly, while others deliver their own slow brand of death.

Clip.Title: WANTED ANACONDA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Find out the truth behind the myths of anacondas as a crew of wildlife photographers and biologists sets out on a mission of fact and fiction.

Clip.Title: FACING THE GIANT BEES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In Nepal, men risk their lives in search of honey, the golden liquid valued since the dawn of time: honey. But to reach the treasure, they must confront the giant bees, the largest bee in the world with a potentially fatal sting.

Clip.Title: WOMEN AMONG WOLVES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This is a story of one woman's passion for wolves. Gudrun Pflueger is an ex world champion cross country skier and long distance runner who is on the search for the coast wolves of British Columbia.
